general.title: Awesome Semantic Commit: Guide to regular commit messages
general.description: Learn best practices for clear, concise commit messages to improve project organization, code readability, team collaboration, and version control.

notFound.title: Page Not Found – Awesome Semantic Commit

commitGenerator.title: Commit Generator – Awesome Semantic Commit
commitGenerator.description: The Commit Generator is a tool that helps you write more organized and meaningful commit messages during project development processes.

semanticCommitValidator.title: Semantic Commit Validator – Awesome Semantic Commit
semanticCommitValidator.description: The Semantic Commit Validator is a tool that checks whether commit messages conform to a specific format (e.g. feat, fix, docs).
